# Commit Convention

## Format ##

[YYYY-MM-DD] Brief present-tense description
[component] Detailed changes
Evidence: See [[Obsidian-Daily-Log]] for details


## Examples ##

[2026-01-17] Implement sentiment analysis module   --- This is just samples ---- Moving forward would real examples be applied. 
[core/analysis.py] Added VADER sentiment scoring with threshold detection
Evidence: See [[2026-01-17#AI Development]] for implementation details


## Components
- core/ - Main system components
- modules/ - Feature modules
- utils/ - Helper functions
- docs/ - Documentation
- tests/ - Testing code
